Package MechSim.Sensors

Class Summary
AccelerometerSensor Measures the force currently applied to the Robot to make it move (e.g., Robot's velocity)
AnalogSensor A Sensor associated with a particular robot.
BooleanSensor A Sensor associated with a particular robot.
BumperSensor A Sensor that notices when a bumper collides with anything
ColorSensor  
DigitalSensor A Sensor associated with a particular robot.
DistanceSensor A Sensor finds the distance to the nearest object directly in front of it.
InfraredDistanceSensor A Sensor finds the distance to the nearest infrared object directly in front of it.
Sensor A Sensor associated with a particular robot
 

Enum Summary
AccelerometerSensor.Direction Direction an AccelerometerSensor can sense force in
